---
name: Maintenance Report
about: Request or report maintenance and housekeeping tasks
title: "Maintenance: [Short description of task]"
labels: maintenance, priority-medium, needs-triage
assignees:
---

### Maintenance Guidelines
- Describe the maintenance task or cleanup requirement clearly
- Explain the impact and importance of this maintenance
- Outline your proposed approach or steps to complete the task
- Include any relevant files or sections that need attention
